name: 10 Seconds to Die (Mikel Dadá)
description:
You have only 10 seconds to die and many ways to do it, can you do it before those 10 seconds are up?

The enemies you meet will take time away from you, but the coins will give you more time so you can move forward.

A game made in 18 hours by Mikel Dadá for the Mini Jam 110
